title: Unbearable
description: It is finally my time.I am an outlaw. The president of the Atlanta charter of the Unacceptables MC.You can call me Bear.I’ve given my blood, sweat, and life to my club. Devotion is a complete understatement.It wasn’t until a cute blonde walked into my garage that I considered giving myself to anything else.Her perfect smile drew me in. Her sass made me crazy.I'll do anything to protect my MC - and now her.
author: Kristen Hope Mazzola
